summary: a Standalone  of \'The Dark Brotherhood Armors TS Edition\'
descriptionHtml:
========================== 20. Jan. 2012 ====================================
- New Robe style stand alone has been uploaded
- Light armor has been updated (version 1.1)
   Hood\'s ground mesh is visible now
   Female\'s gauntles are rightly visible now
   Light armor torso has re-named (Robe -> Suit)

===========================================================================

Finally, I\'ve just made a standalone :D

Most of appearance is same as old version(TDB TS Edition 1.31), but some mesh and texture has changed and will change :)

Non Enchanted and Craftable Light Armor & Robe.

===========================================================================

Description

The Dark Brotherhood Armors TS Edition
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6249

1HD Weapons on Back TS Edition
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6276

===========================================================================

To Installation..
-Light Armor
Data/meshes/armor/DarkFollower/   for Meshes (nif)
Data/textures/armor/DarkFollower/  for Textures (dds)
Data/                                                        for Esp

-Robe
Data/meshes/clothes/RobeDarkFollower/   for Meshes (nif)
Data/textures/cloehes/RobeDarkFollower/  for Textures (dds)
Data/                                                        for Esp

then you might active ESP using Modmanager or Launcher

===========================================================================

Special thanks to TH3WICK3D1
He gaves me most of information to make new Standalone.
I really thanks to him :D
and he has several mods for skyrim

Sexy Dragonscale Armour -Female
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5456

Sexy Ebony Armour -Female
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5285

Sexy Glass Armour -Female
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5868

have fun with it :D
author: TS
